title.rendered: LG joins hand with Smile Foundation for mosquito away campaign

content.rendered:
LG joined hands with Smile Foundation to fight the mosquito menace that has gripped the capital city of Delhi by launching the campaign ‘Save your Family, Save the Community’. The campaign will make people aware of the problem and take the necessary preventive steps.

Fumigation and spraying drive was carried out in all 83 slums and resettlement colonies spread across Delhi, Noida, Greater Noida and Gurugram reaching 5.5 Lakh population. 12 Health Camps have been conducted covering around 3615 direct beneficiaries. 500 Pathological Test with a special focuses on Chikungunya, Dengue and Malaria were conducted. The campaign was covered by more than 27 leading news agencies / portals of the country.
